beats.text: ‘Hrnngh... okay, okay. I'm up. I wasn't sleeping, Little man-cub. I was just... getting some rest this $storyTime.’ |VS| Said $hero_name, smacking their lips, tasting the $storyPollution. |VS| ‘You are restless today. I can feel you fidgeting,’ |VS| added while looking around the sprawling forest.

‘Listen to that. That remote low hum? It isn't the wind. It is $storyCity, far in the distance. That is the Man-Village. That is where we are going now. You need to be with your own kind before the rains come and Shere Khan finds you,’ |VS| said $hero_name whispering.
‘It’s a long walk, and my memory is full of holes. If I only had my journal, I would know the fastest way to $storyCity … we need to find those missing pages. They will guide our way.’
‘You have the first page safe in the bag? Good. Now, let’s find the next page. Lead the way. I'm right behind you.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 1  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
